ai-tha-ap140:1.4_0: the Buddha went to the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap140:2.1_0: Have hearts of love and compassion,
ai-tha-ap140:3.2_0: having raising his joined palms to him.
ai-tha-ap140:3.3_0: Thinking about the Teacher, the teaching,
ai-tha-ap140:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap140:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nārada.
ai-tha-ap140:7.1_0: Eight senior mendicants, following their confidence.
